text: Thank you Dave for the series of lectures. Great delivery. author: @sambaker2611
text: This course has been fantastic, pitched at the right level and a  great pace for someone like me who is not new to R but is new to text analytics and machine learning in general. I find Dave's delivery particularly engaging. Keep up the great content!

author: @nureyna629
text: At 9:55 am not sure if the calculation behind the confusionMatrix function have been done correctly with specifity, I tried to calculate it manually and the result is about 0.96 but all of the other metrics like accuracy and sensitivity are the same ie I compute them manually, so is this a problem with confusionMatrix function or I have missed the concept here?

author: @punithac3019
text: This is an excellent tutorial... thank you so much... Please can you suggest the best way to store the train.tokens.idf data format. Will RData format work. As IDF will be used for testing in later stages, I want to store IDF for reusing it again and again.  Please can you suggest , should the column names used in train.tokens.tfidf should be the same while testing or validating the results, will it give better results?  Thanks in advance
